'''18w43c''' is the third [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on October 26, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w43c|October 24, 2018}}</ref> which fixes bugs in [[18w43a]] and [[18w43b]].

== Additions ==
'''[[Debug screen]]'''
* Pressing {{key|Alt+F3}} shows a server-side ticks-per-second chart in singleplayer.
* Added {{code|delimiter=/|min|avg|max}} tick times to {{key|Alt+F3}} charts to help find stutters.

== Changes ==
'''Performance'''
* Stopped the mob-cap from growing infinitely.
* Reduced stuttering in client and server.
* Improved performance.
